Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.driver

Class AbstractTopic<T extends AbstractTopic<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.driver.AbstractTopic<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, AutoCloseable
public abstract class AbstractTopic<T extends AbstractTopic<T>> extends Object implements AutoCloseable, Provider
Abstract base class for topic implementations. All message sending operations use the Batcher infrastructure. Features provided: - Batching using batcher infrastructure and default batcher configuration - Message validation and preprocessing - Exception propagation (cloud providers handle their own exception mapping) - Before/after send hooks for extensibility - Implementation of send and sendBatch methods Drivers need to provide: - doSendBatch(List) - Provider-specific synchronous batch sending - Override batching configuration methods for provider-specific settings - Override hook methods for custom pre/post-send behavior

    • createBatcherOptions

      protected Batcher.Options createBatcherOptions()
      Creates batcher options for this topic. Provides defaults that cloud providers can override to provide provider-specific batching configuration that aligns with their service limits and performance characteristics.

    • send

      public final void send(Message message)
      Sends a single message synchronously with error handling. This method blocks until the message is successfully sent or an error occurs.

    • close

      public void close() throws Exception
      Implements AutoCloseable interface for try-with-resources support. This method should: - Flush any pending outbound messages - Close network connections - Stop background threads - Release any other resources After calling this method, the topic should not accept new messages. It's safe to call this method multiple times.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Throws:
      Exception
